column1: My mother is unbelievable. Rang me earlier to ask if I was off shopping tomorrow, I said no because of the coronavirus and she said it's all a big fuss over nothing & she's still carrying on as normal.

My mother is unbelievable. Rang me earlier to ask if I was off shopping tomorrow, I said no because of the coronavirus and she said it's all a big fuss over nothing & she's still carrying on as normal.
